pr_title: Revert how readers and writers are registered for REST clients

timeline.bodyText:
Can we have some Javadoc on this one?
It seems pretty generic to be able to understand what it's used for
timeline.author: geoand

timeline.message:
Revert how readers and writers are registered for REST clients

They used to be registered as for the JAX-RS resources but they should
be registered the opposite way.

Fixes #8223
